articles.description: For millions of Americans, this May will be an extra noisy month. A once-every-17 year hatch of periodic cicadas is set to occur across parts of the eastern United States - and it is expected to be big.
articles.title: 'A loud month, for sure': U.S. awaits huge, 17-year cicada hatch - TODAYonline
